name: Firebug Dark Theme (beta)
description:
THIS IS THE MOST COMPLETED THEME EVER FOR FIREBUG.
EVERY PANELS ARE RE-SKINNED!

BIG UPDATE: FIREBUG DARK THEME IS NOW COMPLETELY DARK WITH FT DEEP DARK THEME (PLS CHECK DETAIL IN THE ADDITIONAL INFO SECTION)!!!

=======================
Checkout another cool stuff:
- X-Notifier Toolbar Button Badge:
https://userstyles.org/styles/132739/x-notifier-toolbar-button-badge
additional_info:
Compartible with Firefox 36+.

============
CHANGES LOG
============
- UPDATE #1 (Mar-4-2015): change element colors for HTML > Event Panel
- UPDATE #2 (Mar-8-2015): update screenshot, use with FT Deep Dark theme
- UPDATE #3 (May-8-2015): update CodeMirror editor CSS namespace to prevent overwriting other site style (.CodeMirror -> .cm-s-firebug.CodeMirror)
- UPDATE #4 (Jun-28-2015): update css for panel console
- UPDATE #5 (Oct-17-2015): update color for Net / Cookie panels, add "Courier New" font family
- UPDATE #6 (May-25-2017): Firebug Dark Theme meets FT Deep Dark! Yaayyyy!

======
NOTICE
======
*** It is still beta version, there are some minor issues need to be fixed. ***

- I have contacted Stefano - the author of FT Deep Dark theme, to ask for permission of using (ONLY) Firebug UI from his great theme, he has agreed with these terms:
* I can use the custom elements related to the dark Firebug UI (but only them). 
* I must tell where the code and the graphics elements come from and inform others, if they want to use the code related with the Firebug dark UI skin, to contact the author first (as I did in my case).
- Stefano Original FT Deep Dark Theme: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/ft-deepdark/

- I have changed the license of my theme due to these terms, so pls check again if you're using it somewhere else :)
